name: Objectives
description: A Dungeon is a constructed warren of confinement and control: cells, oubliettes, torture rooms, guard posts, and forgotten maintenance passages layered in cramped geometry. Air, light, and mercy are all in short supply, and the deeper you go, the less the place feels built for the comfort of anything human.

tableData.result: Escape before the last torch dies
Free the one chained beneath the stairs
Silence the informer hidden among prisoners
Reach the cell no map admits
Drag a confession from the unbroken captive
Smuggle contraband past the watchful gargoyles
Seal the passage bleeding cold twilight
Restore power to the rusted portcullis
Discover who holds the master key
Poison the cistern that feeds the guards
Replace the gaoler without being noticed
Exorcise the cell that devours memory
Track the scream that never ends
Claim the blade buried in the oubliette
Find the missing executioner and their tools
Turn the prisoners against their wardens
Sabotage the torture devices before nightfall
Hide a body where stone drinks blood
Map every hidden stair in a single watch
Reach the deepest level and return sane
Lead a doomed march to the gallows
Rescue someone who refuses to leave
End the hunger of the iron maiden
Steal the ledger of names and sins
Swap two prisoners without raising alarm
Follow the rats to their secret pantry
Awaken the dormant guardians beneath the cells
Collapse the corridor of no echoes
Sneak a message into a sealed coffin
Unlock a door that should stay barred
Prove the dungeon itself remembers you
Extinguish the lantern that wards off shadows
Smuggle a monster into the guardroom
Test every chain for a single weak link
Hide until the changing of the torturers
Capture a scream in a blackened bottle
Interrogate the skeleton shackled to nothing
Reach the chapel buried under execution pits
Unbind the spirit nailed to the rack
Replace the flagstones hiding forbidden stairs
Deliver a prisoner to something nonhuman
Confront the architect in their secret cell
Lure the warden into the flooded pits
Trade your name for another’s release
Lock yourself in and break out alive
Follow dried tears to the forgotten door
Break the curse binding doors to blood
Leave something of yourself in every cell
ACTION + THEME
ROLL TWICE

name: Atmosphere
description: A Dungeon is a constructed warren of confinement and control: cells, oubliettes, torture rooms, guard posts, and forgotten maintenance passages layered in cramped geometry. Air, light, and mercy are all in short supply, and the deeper you go, the less the place feels built for the comfort of anything human.

tableData.result: Chains sway in windless dark
Mildew blooms on sweating stone
Distant screams blur into wind
Torchlight crawls like nervous insects
Ceiling drips a slow iron tang
Air thick with old extinguished prayers
Shadows linger after their casters leave
Footsteps echo as if answered
Rot and incense war in silence
Faint bells toll beneath the floor
Walls bulge as if breathing slowly
Locks click by themselves then hush
Whispers seep from hairline cracks
Floor frostbitten despite stale heat
Stale straw stinks of forgotten bodies
Candles bend away from one cell
Rust flakes fall like reddish snow
Every corridor tastes of sapped courage
Dust motes drift like trapped souls
Darkness here feels slightly too heavy
Air hums with restrained sobbing memory
Moans reverberate through hollow pillars
Stone sweats where no heat lies
Keys jingle with no hand holding
Cobwebs cling like desperate fingers
Silence presses soft against eardrums
Fetid puddles mirror nothing above
Breath clouds then vanishes too quickly
Walls stitched with crude iron staples
Chains embedded deep rattle in dreams
A sour metallic mist hangs low
Draft carries faint lullaby of despair
Lantern flames burn colorless and thin
Shadows pool in footprints behind you
Floor stones subtly rearrange between blinks
Inhaled air feels secondhand and used
Far-off grinding suggests dungeon still shifting
The quiet tastes like bitten tongue
Iron bars hum with dull resentment
Cell doors exhale when opened slightly
Ceaseless dripping keeps time for misery
Laughter echoes, brittle and source-less
Cold seeps upward through bare soles
Every breath sounds treasonously loud here
Pale fungi glow with hospital pallor
Corridor corners gather unnatural chill
Faint perfume mingles with old blood
Some stones warm as if watching
ACTION + THEME
ROLL TWICE

name: Locations
description: A Dungeon is a constructed warren of confinement and control: cells, oubliettes, torture rooms, guard posts, and forgotten maintenance passages layered in cramped geometry. Air, light, and mercy are all in short supply, and the deeper you go, the less the place feels built for the comfort of anything human.

tableData.result: Collapsed guard post choked with rusted spears
Oubliette shaft whispering with unseen breath
Torture gallery lined in flayed banners
Flooded cellblock humming with blind leeches
Narrow stair spiraling into breathless black
Rotting barracks stinking of old chain oil
Ceiling of hooks swaying without a draft
Stone kennel slick with gnawed bone slop
Pillory hall etched with begging fingernails
Abandoned watchtower strangled by iron ivy
Vent tunnel exhaling hot metallic sighs
Low vault of coffins chained shut
Guard captain’s den cluttered with broken masks
Trap workshop cluttered with bloodstained tools
Bridge of ribs spanning bottomless chute
Chapel alcove drowned in candle wax
Execution pit rimmed with scorched fetters
Archive of shackles sorted by wrist size
Scribe cell illuminated by blistering rune
Well of drinking water tasting like coins
Feeding troughs amid gnawed manacles and straw
Hidden sally port sealed by fused hinges
Collapsed torture theater beneath sagging chains
Fungus-lit corridor breathing damp and spores
Guard muster yard echoing with phantom drills
Latrine trench clogged with pale, moving roots
Interrogator’s parlor warm with muffled sobs
Observation slit overlooking unlit slaughter floor
Choked chimney shaft rattling with falling teeth
Storage vault of labeled bone fragments
Butcher’s stall reeking of salted prisoner
Cramped ladderway buzzing with trapped flies
Iron maze of deadfall portcullises
Ossuary stair carpeted in powdered skulls
Armory of warped shields and bent halberds
Guard kennel reeking of diseased warhounds
Warden’s overlook shrouded in bloodstained curtains
Suffocation cell padded with damp leather
Abandoned infirmary stocked with black leeches
Mess hall tables scarred by desperate prayers
Secret crawlspace swallowed by clotted cobwebs
Floodgate chamber dripping slow red seepage
Forgotten visitation room with bolted chairs
Collapsed ceiling exposing root-choked stone
Isolation wing humming with distant lullabies
Ceaselessly ticking cage of clockwork restraints
Vertigo balcony above endless chained void
CONNECTION WEB
ACTION + THEME
ROLL TWICE

name: Discoveries
description: A Dungeon is a constructed warren of confinement and control: cells, oubliettes, torture rooms, guard posts, and forgotten maintenance passages layered in cramped geometry. Air, light, and mercy are all in short supply, and the deeper you go, the less the place feels built for the comfort of anything human.

tableData.result: Iron maiden filled with dried petals
Cell wall scratched with reversed prayers
Blood-slick ladder descending into silence
Torchlight swallowed by a kneeling archway
Keys grown into a gaoler’s ribcage
Choke-chain collars bolted along corridor
Floor grating exhaling distant funeral hymns
Rust-furred chains arranged like a constellation
Peephole watching from inside the stone
Mildewed ledger listing tomorrow’s executions
Crank that turns but moves nothing
Bone dice scattered around a cracked manacle
Hidden drain pulsing with warm breath
Ceiling hooks still creak without wind
Moss spelling names in slow dripping
False door opening into upright coffin
Iron bars fused by melted fingerprints
Bucket of tongues held on ice
Guardroom bed neatly made, occupant absent
Trapdoor sealed with dried black tears
Whip hanging, braided from pale hair
Oubliette echo repeating words incorrectly
Mold-veiled mural of smiling prisoners
Cage suspended over bottomless black shaft
Lantern burning without flame or fuel
Wall-mounted wheel turning on its own
Rat-chewed map of impossible corridors
Stone idol wearing a fresh hood
Grindstone wet with recent bone dust
Chalk outline pacing inside its cell
Water trough reflecting someone else’s face
Secret passage lined with nailed shadows
Torture rack bearing wilted wildflowers
Skeleton shackled by unbroken silk ropes
Trap corridor reset using living bait
Vent leaking sobs instead of air
Guard post abandoned mid-hand of cards
Door hinges grown over with teeth
Maintenance hatch sealed by stitched leather
Window looking into a buried sky
Pile of locks missing their keyholes
Collapsing stair supported by bound statues
Iron mask whispering offers of safety
Chains arranged into a crude cradle
Wall pipe dripping liquid daylight slowly
Spiked pit cushioned with moulted skins
Tally marks ending in a bloodied question
CONNECTION WEB
DESCRIPTOR + FOCUS
ROLL TWICE

name: Banes
description: A Dungeon is a constructed warren of confinement and control: cells, oubliettes, torture rooms, guard posts, and forgotten maintenance passages layered in cramped geometry. Air, light, and mercy are all in short supply, and the deeper you go, the less the place feels built for the comfort of anything human.

tableData.result: Rust-slick bars bite through grasping hands
Floor stones hinge into silent throat pits
Chained lantern smoke whispers binding oaths
Ceiling hooks sway with unseen breath
Dripping chains echo wrong, counting down
Moss-veiled flagstones drink warm blood gladly
Keyrings fuse to flesh, metal rooting
Nails grow barbs that snag on air
Iron maiden arms open, hungry and patient
Gallows rope slithers, seeking a neck
Torture rack tightens without any hands
Branding irons glow at unsummoned names
Grates exhale spores that rot memory
Wall manacles close like shark jaws
Cells rearrange, swallowing paths behind you
Shackles sprout spikes when hope rises
Oubliette walls slowly creep inward nightly
Drains gurgle secrets that curse listeners
Muffled sobs seep from unfitted bricks
Torchlight breeds shadows that gnaw ankles
Guard post arrows track breathing alone
Locks forget owners, remember only screams
Damp straw births biting centipede swarms
Ceiling fungus releases sleep-thick yellow dust
Hooks pull upward when names are spoken
Rusted hinges shriek, calling hungry things
Iron collars tighten with every lie
Floor irons brand footprints that bleed
Grim statues inhale, stealing your courage
Whip scars crawl, forming binding sigils
Barred windows open only onto void
Pit floors are layered with teeth
Razor wire vines creep across corridors
Mazes reshift whenever eyes are closed
Chains whisper bargains in dead languages
Benches sprout restraints beneath sitting weight
Water in troughs ferments into anguish
Vent shafts exhale choking graveyard chill
Skeletons locked in stocks still struggle
Iron spikes thirst for kneeling backs
Dungeon bells toll only for trespass
Spare keys duplicate, each one wrong
Invisible wardens tally every stolen breath
Blood on walls refuses to dry
Rotting doors bloom with narcotic spores
Latticed floors reveal writhing things beneath
Shadow iron bars exist only sometimes
Steps descend forever, never reaching bottom
DESCRIPTOR + FOCUS
ROLL TWICE

name: Boons
description: A Dungeon is a constructed warren of confinement and control: cells, oubliettes, torture rooms, guard posts, and forgotten maintenance passages layered in cramped geometry. Air, light, and mercy are all in short supply, and the deeper you go, the less the place feels built for the comfort of anything human.

tableData.result: Hidden cache beneath loose bloodstained stone
Rusty manacles crack open, spilling keys
Guardroom dice show impossible winning streak
Fungus lamp glows brighter near secret exits
Snapped torture rack hides smuggled healer kit
Collapsed cell wall reveals forgotten armory
Rotting straw conceals warded silver dagger
Dry cistern echoes with guiding whispers
Crude map scratched behind latrine bricks
Chained skeleton points toward weaker mortar
Vent grating rattles, exhaling clean air
Abandoned meal still warm, poison removed
Mildewed banner wraps you in muffled silence
Iron maiden opens on untouched passage
Executioner’s hood grants faceless anonymity
Dripping ceiling reveals outline of stairwell
Torch sconce twists, deadening distant screams
Pit of bones hides blessed reliquary
Guard’s purse heavy with unspent bribes
Blood channel runs toward escape culvert
Forgotten bell rope jammed safely mute
Prison ledger lists false deaths, your names
Black mold recoils from your quiet breath
Grinding portcullis jams halfway, just enough
Tally marks form code for safe route
Fettered statue’s hand clutches warding charm
Dungeon rats swarm, then guide your steps
Branding irons cool, losing their sting
Shackles here snap open at your touch
Trap trigger already sprung by unlucky predecessor
Guard shift song echoes, revealing safe timing
Spilled oil outlines invisible warded circle
Faded mural shows hidden lock mechanism
Sewer grate bars eaten thin by rust
Wall moss numbs pain where applied thick
Old torture notes detail jailer’s secret fears
Oubliette floor softer than it appears
Ceiling chain lowers forgotten winch platform
Watchdog sleeps, lulled by distant lullaby
Dungeon incense masks your sweat and heartbeat
Iron door swollen, cannot fully close
Murmured prayers from below strengthen resolve
Hoist crank still greased, silent when turned
Prisoner graffiti warns of trap, saves
Guard’s cloak left hanging, perfectly your size
Crumbling arch leaves daylight hairline glimmer
Warden’s keys misplaced on unattended hook
